name: Bow and Light Range Penalty
desc: Gives the hit penalty for long range.
components: -25 * (utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, target.position) -2) if target and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, target.position) > 2 and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, target.position) in item_funcs.get_range(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else 0
